title: Flow States, Contemplation, and Mattering: Clues to Humanity's Role in the Cosmos
description:
Recent conversations in this corner of the internet have me thinking about how we activate those states of mind that engender wisdom and how these are clues to our place in the cosmic order related to the three offices of Christ. Grist for the mill of this video:
John Vervaeke with Andrew Sweeney https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C42TmeFHNmI
Q&A for "The Meaning Crisis, Religio, and Religion in the 21st Century" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-wtiJ9dBL8
Hearkening to the hidden Awakening the Wonder -part 1. J. Vervaeke, J. Niederhauser & G. Sengstock https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yXp1zjU9Jqc
Joe Rogan Experience #1434 - Trevor Thompson https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3nSqQhlCmA
Bryan Callen on "The Portal", Ep. #009 - Cracking Wise https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PzqPV6BWVm4
